evolution_drafts.name: anomaly_timeline_engine
evolution_drafts.summary: Build rolling anomaly timelines over fee / load / policy signals.
evolution_drafts.motivation: Give operators a time-based view of when and why pressure appears.

evolution_drafts.name: rpc_reliability_estimator
evolution_drafts.summary: Score XRPL RPC nodes by latency, error rate, and data consistency.
evolution_drafts.motivation: Increase robustness of read-only observers and avoid noisy nodes.

evolution_drafts.name: mesh_bias_detector
evolution_drafts.summary: Detect systematic biases in advice for wallets, integrators, and operators.
evolution_drafts.motivation: Ensure balanced recommendations across user groups and flows.

evolution_drafts.name: fee_pressure_playbook_generator
evolution_drafts.summary: Generate human-readable playbooks for fee pressure modes.
evolution_drafts.motivation: Make it trivial to operationalize AI advice into standard operating procedures.

evolution_drafts.name: pressure_resilience_simulator
evolution_drafts.summary: Offline simulator for infra reaction to sustained fee pressure.
evolution_drafts.motivation: Understand how infra scales when pressure persists for hours/days.
